bib.title: Arabic WordNet and the challenges of Arabic
bib.author: Elkateb, Sabry and Black, William and Vossen, Piek and Farwell, David and Rodr{\'\i}guez, H and Pease, A and Alkhalifa, M and others
bib.abstract: Arabic WordNet is a lexical resource for Modern Standard Arabic based on the widely used Princeton WordNet for English (Fellbaum, 1998). Arabic WordNet (AWN) is based on the design and contents of the universally accepted Princeton WordNet (PWN) and will be
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of Arabic NLP/MT Conference, London, UK
